translations.source: Please, check the box called 'Allow Scripts to write files...' in the general preferences of After Effects.
translations.translation: 请在After Effects中的通用设置里勾选“允许脚本写入文件…”

translations.source: A new version of Duik is available,\ngo to http://rainboxprod.coop to download it
translations.translation: 已发现新版的Duik，\n前往 http://rainboxprod.coop 下载

translations.source:
UPDATE AVAILABLE -

A new version of Duik is available!
Version:
translations.translation:
已有升级可用 - 

新版Duik已可用！
版本号：

translations.source:
After Effects must be restarted

to complete the installation of Duik

May the god(s?) of animation be with you!
translations.translation:
After Effects需要重启

来完成Duik的安装

愿动画之神与你同在！

translations.source:
Open the file 'presetEffects.xml':
Right click on
Applications/Adobe After Effects/Adobe After Effects.app,
Select 'Show package contents', go to
Contents/Resources/PresetEffects.xml.
translations.translation:
打开“presetEffects.xml”文件：
右键单击
Applications/Adobe After Effects/Adobe After Effects.app，
选择“显示包内容”，进入
Contents/Resources/PresetEffects.xml。

translations.source:
Copy the content of the box below,
hit Cmd+A
to select all the text,
then Cmd+C to copy it.
translations.translation:
拷贝下面文本框内的内容，
按cmd+A
全选文本，
然后按cmd+C来拷贝它。

translations.source: Paste this text in the file 'presetEffects.xml'\njust BEFORE the last line: '</effects>'.
translations.translation: 在文件“presetEffects.xml”的最后一个“</effects>”的*上一行*\n粘贴拷贝的内容

translations.source: The autorig does not work with 3D Layers
translations.translation: 自动绑定对3D图层不起效

translations.source: Select the bones and the controller before creating IK
translations.translation: 选择骨节和控制器来创建IK
Duik - 显示隐藏的控制器

translations.source: The layers are at the same place.
Select a layer to apply Zero
translations.translation: 选择一个图层以运用归零

translations.source: Select the property where to apply the \"wiggle\" function
translations.translation: 选择需要执行“抖动”的属性

translations.source: Cannot create expression on this effect
translations.translation: 无法在此效果上创建表达式

translations.source: Select the effect where you want to create the spring
translations.translation: 选择一个效果以创建回弹

translations.source: Please select the layers from which you want to save animation
translations.translation: 请选择需要保存动画的图层
Duik - 导入 TVPaint 摄像机
带有自动保存的简单的记事本。

translations.source: Warning, this is a version for testing purposes only!
translations.translation: 警告，这个版本仅做测试用！

translations.source: A form is available at http://duiktest.duduf.net
translations.translation: 在 https://duiktest.duduf.net 上有一个列表

translations.source: If you need help using Duik,
translations.translation: 如果你在使用Duik时需要帮助，

translations.source: Kevin Schires - Including images in the script
translations.translation: Kevin Schires - 将UI图片转换为文本格式

translations.source: Warning, interactive update can create a LOT of history items (Undos) and could easily fill up your entire history.
translations.translation: 警告，交互式更新会产生大量的历史记录（Undos），这很容易填满你的整个返回操作列表

translations.source: Automatically paste animation in the comp (using layer names)
translations.translation: （以图层名称的方式）在合成中（以图层名称的方式），自动粘贴动画

translations.source: The property will automatically bounce like a spring
translations.translation: 属性值会像弹簧一样回弹

translations.source: Automates the rotation of a wheel while moving the layer
translations.translation: 自动旋转轮子来贴合图层的位移

translations.source: Creates a lens flare with selected layers
translations.translation: 用选定的多个图层创建镜头光晕

translations.source: A simple controller to move away a layer from its parent
translations.translation: 将子物体沿着与父级相同的方位移动

translations.source: Links an effect with the distance with another layer
translations.translation: 用另一个图层的位移来控制一个效果

translations.source: Changes the exposure of the animation on the selected property
translations.translation: 修改选定属性的动画曝光表

translations.source: Rig the paint effects to be able to animate all strokes as if there was only one.
translations.translation: 将所有的笔触效果绑定为同一个动画方便K动画。

translations.source: Rig the paint effects to be able to animate selected strokes as if there was only one.
translations.translation: 将选定的笔触效果绑定为同一个动画方便K动画。

translations.source: Creates animation controllers for a camera
translations.translation: 为摄像机创建动画控制器

translations.source: Links the distance of the layer from the camera to its scale, so its apparent size won't change.
translations.translation: 将图层到摄像机的距离与图层的缩放链接起来，以保证图层比例不会改变

translations.source: Creates multiplane controllers to use as a 2D camera
translations.translation: 创建多平面控制器以便用2D摄像机来模拟空间
从 TVPaint 中导入相机

translations.source: Warning! When controllers are locked,\nthey should be unlocked before parenting.
translations.translation: 警告！当控制器被锁定时，\n它们在创建父子关系时必须先解锁

translations.source: Lock selected controllers\n(all controllers if none selected)
translations.translation: 锁定所选控制器\n（若没有选择则锁定所有控制器）

translations.source: Hide selected controllers\n(all controllers if none selected)
translations.translation: 隐藏所选控制器\n（若没有选择则隐藏所有控制器）

translations.source: Lower accuracy can speed up analysis
translations.translation: 更低的准确度将提升分析速度

translations.source: Higher tolerance will result in higher exposure
translations.translation: 更大的容差度将得到更长的曝光时间
分析图层以得到曝光时间
创建3D多平面摄像机绑定
测量到另一个物体间的距离

translations.source: When the Spring is used on the position property of a layer,
translations.translation: 当回弹用在一个图层的位移属性上时，
不进行解算 - 计算量小
进行解算 - 大量计算

translations.source: Resulting animation may be smoother too.
Duik must be restarted to apply changes.
translations.translation: 必须重启Duik以使更改起效

translations.source: Please be patient while Duik is doing its magic.
translations.translation: 请耐心等待Duik完成它的魔法
